Citrus_Heights.Rusch Botanical Gardens: The Rusch Botanical Gardens 2 acres (8,000 m²) are located at 7801 Auburn Boulevard in Citrus Heights, California, United States. Originally laid out in 1916, these gardens are a State Site of Historical Interest, and represent seven biomes of California; featuring rose, herb, citrus, and African plants. They are open daily, dawn to dusk.
